title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: Key Developments and Updates”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked targets of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in southern Lebanon.

Combat aircraft attacked targets of the terrorist organization Hezbollah a short while ago, including a military structure, a launch position, and Hezbollah’s terrorist infrastructure in the Aitaroun area, alongside the organization’s terrorist infrastructure in the Maysaloon area.

Simultaneously, a Hezbollah launch cell was attacked by aircraft in the area of Dahr al-Amas in southern Lebanon.

Following alerts that were activated recently in the Finger of the Galilee, approximately fifteen launches were identified crossing from Lebanese territory. Some were intercepted by air defense fighters, while the rest fell in open areas, and there were no casualties reported.

Attached is documentation of the attacks in the Aitaroun area: https://bit.ly/3VnMEzp
